name: Adam Peltz
text: Food is fine and average.    Out of the 12 deliveries over months,  3 took over 2 hours to deliver when the estimate was 30-60 minutes.  Items ordered  were forgotten twice and was wrong once even with online ordering which has a written …More

name: Umair Khan
text: Okay food, wait time is long for everything.

name: Timmy Turn-up
text: Awesome pizza. Staff are cool. Delivery is even better (ask for the lady delivery driver. Shes fast and best service). Wait time for delivery or pick up may be long when busy (as expected).

name: Noah Messier
text: Well I work here so I kind of have to have a good review. But honestly- on busy nights like fridays or on Halloween, always check your orders right when you get them. There's a good chance we missed something. Maybe we forgot onions on your …More

name: Karlen The Conservative
text: Me, my Wife and Son stopped by yesterday and had a great experience! We were treated so well and I was very impressed by how welcomed we were and the hospitality was wonderful! Dilza and her crew work very hard making delicious food and treating they're customers with the highest respect! Best Papa Gino's you can find!!

name: Nicholas Cassidy
text: Not good it was closed permanently  all of the sudden they closed fifty stores no warning no nuthin I m gi g to miss a great location and great staff always happy help . But no more I think of the poor families that worked they only to be …More

name: Julie Nguyen
text: Pizza was good! Staff and manager were super friendly! I will be back!

name: John H
text: Food was decent, service was awful! Put in an online order at 5 pm for delivery at 7pm. 730 and a no show so I called. Went directly to hold and after 15 min I gave up. Had to go pick it up after paying a delivery fee and tip during my order! Awful!!

name: Celtics Fan
text: Let me start by saying i love papa ginos. Since i moved to canton i avoid it at all costs. The delivery is horrible . Always over an hour, usually cold too. On some deliveries the order is wrong. 4/4 bad service via delivery. Dine in is slightly better.

name: Kimberly GetYourHealthOn
text: Marina and Katie are ROCKSTARS!  Great experience....this is what customer service should look like!  Super glad we came here since the Cape doesn't offer the all you can eat deal! They took EXCELLENT care of our party of 8!

name: Jason Davison
text: Had my 10th Birthday party here 40 years ago they let me make a pizza and gave me a little certificate. Papa Gino's birthday parties were the best! On the west coast now and nothing here compares to that thin chewy crust.

name: Derek Sulesky
text: Can't even pick the pizza up without  the cheese sliding off because  they dont now how to stretch dough correctly,  50/50 u get a good pie!!

name: Michael Giannangelo
text: Easter Sunday....I'm sure the staff would rather be off but they welcomed me and my guest, got great service and a delicious meal. Thx guys for being open for us.

name: Rob Gray
text: Very long delay. Ordered 2 pizzas online and was told to pick them up at 6:16. They weren't done until 6:40. The quality of the pizza's where good.

name: jay g
text: Burnt my food last time. Under cooked this time. Called to complain and just put on hold for 5 minutes untill I hung up. Worst papa ginos I've been too.

name: KR80
text: This location always does a F'IN FANTASTIC JOB with any pizza

name: Susan St George
text: Fast and freindly service! Exceptional food quality!

name: Brook Fierra
text: We ordered extra large pizza, bread stix, salad & cinnamon bread stix. None of it was good. Barely edible. No one ate it. Awful waste of money.

name: Alison Kan
text: Pretty standard Papa Ginos. Service was pretty good.

name: Sebastian Ronin
text: I ordered two chicken wings for myself and my cats, I ORDERED EXTRA RANCH DIPPING SAUCE, it arrived already opened and half consumed. The delivery driver had ranch smeared all over his face and fingers, as he accepted my coupons. He was portly and threatened to put me in an 'ahmbah' if I squealed. This is highly unprofessional.

name: Anthony Casna
text: I ordered online and was told my for would be ready for pick up at 735. I walked out if they're at 825 with 2 cold pizzas that we're ready 20 minutes before the sides. And all of the people working were joking around while there were a bunch of is waiting for our orders that were extremely late

name: Anh Tran-Redoble
text: Fast friendly service. Good pizza

name: Kimberly Forde
text: I ordered a salad and two hot dogs for my coworker. The restaurant is only three miles from my work, and I would have picked up the order myself, if I had time to leave. We were givin a delivery time of 1:31 (about an hour from when I …More

name: s lawson
text: I stopped going to PG years ago.  They take way to long for their mediocre food.  Not worth it

name: Rob Piscitello
text: It is Papa Gino's.  Decent Pizza with other food options.  Typical chain.

name: Roy W
text: Pizza that is fresh.good  papa gino s location

name: Chris Levis
text: Fountain beverages, claw machine, and best of the chain pizzas.

name: Andy Wong
text: Used to be better a few years back.

name: John Owens
text: Yes they don't practice a no skin contact with preparing pizzas.the board of health should be notified!!!

name: Tobi Whitney
text: They offer gluten free crust!

name: The MonTaj Channel
text: Disappointed, food was cold and long wait when picked up. Former Papa Gino’s employee and the appearance was horrible. Not happy!

name: Peter Chikov
text: Convenient. Best pizza!

name: Dr High Horse
text:
24/7 roach party

Management treats their employees as if they are subhuman.

name: boredoms1
text: They got my order wrong and waiting area was like a day-care.

name: anonymous account
text: They just gave me the blatantly wrong thing and it was cold AF

name: Chad Eric
text: Best pizza in Wakanda

name: rest in bread
text: Service is too slow

name: Avital Pery
text: I wouldn't even give 1 star !! Lousy service very rude !!!!
